alert.message: vit-ops: A Jormungandr catalyst-fund namespace cluster has produced less than 2.5 blocks averaged across the whole cluster, for more than 5 minutes.
alert.name: [Vit] Jormungandr Block Height Cluster Rate alert

alert.message: vit-ops: A Jormungandr node in a catalyst-fund namespace has produced less than 2.5 blocks on average for more than 5 minutes.
alert.name: [Vit] Jormungandr Block Height Node Rate alert

alert.message:
vit-ops: For a catalyst-fund cluster, one or both of the following conditions have occurred:
* A single Jormungandr node has restarted more than 5 times in the past hour
* The Jormungandr cluster has collectively restarted the service Jormungandr services more than 10 times in the past hour
alert.name: [Vit] Jormungandr Service Restarts in 1 hr alert

panels.description: Jormungandr restarts in a 1 hr rolling window
panels.title: Jormungandr Service Restarts in 1 hr

alert.message: vit-ops: Jormungandr catalyst-fund cluster has failed to complete an hourly backup.
alert.name: [Vit] Jormungandr Completed Backup Jobs alert

panels.description: Jormungandr completed backups in a 1 hr period
panels.title: Jormungandr Completed Backup Jobs

alert.message: vit-ops: Jormungandr catalyst-fund cluster has failed an hourly backup job.
alert.name: [Vit] Jormungandr Failed Backup Jobs alert

panels.description: Jormungandr failed backups in a 1 hr period
panels.title: Jormungandr Failed Backup Jobs
Cluster Aggregate Data Transfer, 1 hr Rolling Window

panels.description: Counts memory that is free as well as reclaimable from caches and buffers
panels.title: Node Memory Available (%)

panels.description: Counts only memory that is physically free
panels.title: Node Memory Free (%)
